careers.title: Join the Collective
careers.subtitle: We are looking for the misfits, the rebels, and the troublemakers who push the human race forward.

marketing.title: Marketing Specialist
marketing.description: Lead our growth. Craft campaigns that don't just reach people, but move them.
responsibilities: Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies.
Manage social media channels and content calendars.
Analyze campaign performance and optimize for ROI.
Collaborate with design and dev teams for product launches.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in digital marketing.
Proficiency in SEO, SEM, and analytics tools.
Strong copywriting and storytelling skills.
Fluency in Arabic and English.

software.title: Software Engineer
software.description: Architect scalable systems. Write code that is as beautiful as it is functional.
responsibilities: Build and maintain high-performance web applications using Next.js.
Write clean, maintainable, and type-safe code.
Participate in code reviews and architectural discussions.
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
requirements: Strong proficiency in TypeScript, React, and Node.js.
Experience with modern frontend tools (Tailwind, Framer Motion).
Understanding of server-side rendering and static generation.
Problem-solving mindset and attention to detail.

sales.title: Sales Specialist
sales.description: Build relationships. Close deals that transform businesses.
responsibilities: Identify and qualify new business opportunities.
Build and maintain strong, long-lasting client relationships.
Negotiate contracts and close agreements.
Forecast sales activity and revenue achievement.
requirements: Proven work experience as a Sales Representative or similar role.
Excellent selling, communication, and negotiation skills.
Prioritizing, time management, and organizational skills.
Ability to create and deliver presentations tailored to audience needs.

photographer.title: Photographer
photographer.description: Capture the essence. Visual storytelling through the lens.
responsibilities: Capture high-quality images for clients and internal projects.
Edit and retouch photos to meet brand standards.
Collaborate with the creative team on visual direction.
Manage equipment and studio setup.
requirements: Strong portfolio demonstrating skills in portrait and product photography.
Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Lightroom).
Experience with studio lighting and equipment.
Creative eye and attention to detail.

social.title: Social Media Specialist
social.description: Own the conversation. Build communities, not just followers.
responsibilities: Create engaging daily content for all social media platforms.
Monitor trends and engage with the community.
Develop social media strategies to increase brand awareness.
Report on social media metrics and insights.
requirements: Proven experience as a Social Media Specialist.
Excellent knowledge of Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, and TikTok.
Strong content creation skills (video/photo).
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment.

uiux.title: UX/UI Designer
uiux.description: Design the future. Create interfaces that feel like magic.
responsibilities: Gather and evaluate user requirements in collaboration with PMs and engineers.
Illustrate design ideas using storyboards, process flows, and sitemaps.
Design graphic user interface elements (menus, tabs, widgets).
Develop UI mockups and prototypes.
requirements: Proven work experience as a UI/UX Designer.
Portfolio of design projects.
Knowledge of wireframe tools (e.g., Figma).
Team spirit; strong communication skills to collaborate with various stakeholders.
